sentences.en: Ann wanted the conservatory to integrate with the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 安想把温室与厨房打通。

sentences.en: Data networks and electronic fund transfer already integrate data transfer into source industries.
sentences.cn: 数据网络和电子资金转移系统已经把资料的转移和资料的来源合而为一了.

sentences.en: Do you really want to integrate with us?
sentences.cn: 你们真的想和我们联合 吗 ?

sentences.en: Encouraging teacher transfer would not, by itself, integrate the teaching corps.
sentences.cn: 鼓励教师调动本身不会消弭教学队伍中的种族隔离。

sentences.en: He didn't integrate successfully into the Italian way of life.
sentences.cn: 他没有成功融入到意大利的生活方式中去。

sentences.en: It has been very difficult to integrate all of the local agencies into the national organization.
sentences.cn: 将所有的地方机构合并为全国性的机构一直非常困难.

sentences.en: Our approach is always to integrate residential buildings sympathetically into their environment.
sentences.cn: 我们的方法总是将居住建筑物和谐地融入到它们的环境之中.

sentences.en: Schools came to us because they wanted to integrate.
sentences.cn: 学校来向我们寻求帮助是因为他们想让不同种族的学生得到平等待遇。

sentences.en: The city will integrate all public services.
sentences.cn: 这个城市将把所有的公共场所对各族人民开放.

sentences.en: The Marine Corps was the last service to integrate.
sentences.cn: 美国海军陆战队是最后合并的部队。

sentences.en: The rapid development of Integrate Circuit improves world's economy a lot.
sentences.cn: 集成电路“日新月异”的发展一次又一次的谱写了世界经济发展的新篇章.

sentences.en: These programs can be integrated with your existing software.
sentences.cn: 这些程序能和你的已有的软件整合成一体。

sentences.en: These programs will integrate with your existing software.
sentences.cn: 这些程序将和你的已有软件可综合成整体。

sentences.en: We are trying to integrate production , supply , and sale.
sentences.cn: 我们正在努力实现 产供销 一条龙.

sentences.en: We integrate the profits of all our branches into our net profit.
sentences.cn: 我们把所有分店的利润都加进了纯利润里.

sentences.en: We must integrate theory with practice.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把理论与实际结合起来.

sentences.en: We should, most of all, integrate theory with practice.
sentences.cn: 我们尤其应该把理论与实践结合起来.

sentences.en: Writers of history books often attempt to integrate the past with the present.
sentences.cn: 写历史书的人总是力图把过去与现在联系起来.

words.tran_cn: 综合的；完整的；互相协调的
[数] 整数；整体；完整的事物
主张取消种族隔离的人
[自] 积分器；[电子] 积分电路；整合之人
整合；使…成整体（integrate的过去分词）
求积分；取消隔离；成为一体

trans.tran_cn: 合并，成为一体，加入，融入群体
trans.tran_en: to become part of a group or society and be accepted by them, or to help someone do this（
